dsOverview.title: German IGY Tropical Sea Level Pressure, daily 1957Jun-1958

summary.p: This dataset contains sea-level pressure data on a 5-degree latitude/longitude grid over the global tropics from 25S to 25N. The time period covered by the data is for the International Geophysical Year (IGY) of June 1957 to December 1958.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DE/DWD > Deutscher Wetterdienst (German Meteorological Service), Germany

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Pressure > Sea Level Pressure
